projects.title: KasaPa
projects.description: An AI-powered mobile app built to support speech-impaired individuals in Ghana, using local languages and fostering inclusion.
highlights: Support for Akan speaking speech impaired

projects.title: Mechanic Worshop Management System
projects.description: Developed a web application for Mr Nash; an automobile expert at Dzorwulu to manage his workshop.

projects.title: OTConekt
projects.description: OTConekt is a cross-platform mobile tele-rehabilitation app that connects individuals seeking occupational therapy with licensed therapists. Built using React Native (Expo) and powered by Supabase, this project focuses on accessibility, flexibility, and seamless virtual care.

projects.title: Zest
projects.description: The Point of Sale Application that helps small businesses in Africa thrive.
